titles: Another ballad called the libertines lampoone, or, The curvets of conscience to the tune of Thomas Varner, or 60 / written by the authour of the Geneva Ballad.
author: Butler, Samuel, 1612-1680.
publisher: Printed for F.K. and Edward Thomas, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Geneva ballad "attributed to Samuel Butler"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproductions of originals in Chetham's Library and British Library.
Identified as B601 in reel guide; in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) as A3249.
